metadata.name: Current alarm count
metadata.description: Current number of alarms that exist in the system

metadata.name: Number of new alarms past 24
metadata.description: Number of new alarms generated in the past 24 hours

metadata.name: Current count of Applications
metadata.description: Current number of Applications defined in the system

metadata.name: System CPU count
metadata.description: Number of CPU cores the core OS kernel sees

metadata.name: System CPU Utilization
metadata.description: Current System CPU utilization percentage

metadata.name: System Memory Utilization
metadata.description: Current System Memory utilization percentage

metadata.name: Current business service count
metadata.description: Number of business services defined in the system

metadata.name: Cloud instance type (Cloud VM only)
metadata.description: Name of the instance type (e.g. t2.large, Standard_F2s, e2-standard-4, ...)

metadata.name: Cloud name (Cloud VM only)
metadata.description: Name of the cloud environment (e.g. EC2, AzurePublicCloud, AWS GovCloud...)

metadata.name: Cloud region (Cloud VM only)
metadata.description: Name of the least-granular region / location / availability zone designation of this instance's placement in the cloud (e.g. us-east-1a, eastus, ...)

metadata.name: Cloud vendor(Cloud VM only)
metadata.description: Name of the cloud vendor (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP, AlibabaCloud, OpenStack...)

metadata.name: Flows persisted
metadata.description: Number of flow records persisted since the core last started up

metadata.name: Flows per second
metadata.description: Number of flows per second for the past 24 hours

metadata.name: Metrics persisted
metadata.description: Number of metric data items persisted to time-series storage since the core last started up

metadata.name: RDBMS type
metadata.description: Whether PostgreSQL or some other RDBMS is in use

metadata.name: RDBMS version
metadata.description: Version of RDBMS in use

metadata.name: DCB: cumulative time in web UI
metadata.description: Total time, in seconds, that any user has spent using the DCB UI, from entry to exit; must survive a restart

metadata.name: DCB: cumulative backup failure count
metadata.description: Total number of config backup attempts ever failed in this system, including deleted entries; must survive a restart

metadata.name: DCB: cumulative config count
metadata.description: Total number of device configs ever successfully stored in this system, including deleted entries; must survive a restart

metadata.name: DCB: cumulative web UI entries
metadata.description: Total number of times any user has entered the DCB UI, excluding manual refreshes; must survive a restart

metadata.name: Current destination path count
metadata.description: Site's level of granularity when using notifications

metadata.name: Enlinkd: Links by protocol
metadata.description: Number of links found by Enlinkd, broken down by link protocol

metadata.name: Enlinkd: Nodes with links
metadata.description: Number of nodes having at least one link

metadata.name: Event-logs processed
metadata.description: Number of event-logs processed by Eventd since the core last started up

metadata.name: Current event count
metadata.description: Count of events have been created since the system was installed

metadata.name: Number of new events past 24
metadata.description: Number of new events generated in the past 24 hours

metadata.name: Free physical memory size
metadata.description: How much physical memory does the core OS kernel see?

metadata.name: Current group count
metadata.description: How many groups the system's users are organized into for notification purposes

metadata.name: Containerization status
metadata.description: Whether or not the core appears to be running inside a containerized environment such as Docker or podman

metadata.name: List of Karaf features installed
metadata.description: Which features are installed on the core system

metadata.name: List of OIA plugins loaded
metadata.description: Which OpenNMS-provided or third-party plugins are installed at the site

metadata.name: Current IP interfaces count
metadata.description: Count of IP addresses that the system knows about across all devices

metadata.name: ipInterfacesPerNodeMode
metadata.description: Arithmetic mode of the number of IP interfaces per node, calculated both canonically and with zero-interface nodes excluded from consideration. The string key divides the two sets; the lists are empty if no mode exists for its considered population.

metadata.name: ipInterfacesPerNodeStats
metadata.description: Statistical breakdown of the distribution of IP interfaces across nodes. For the population of nodes, characterize the number of IP interfaces per node as minimum, maximum, arithmetic mean (rounded value), and median (rounded value). Each set is calculated both canonically and with zero-interface nodes excluded from the population; the topmost string key divides the two sets.

metadata.name: Meta: REST endpoint for reading all KPIs
metadata.description: Create a REST API endpoint which exposes all the KPIs

metadata.name: Minion count
metadata.description: How many Minions are registered

metadata.name: Monitored services count
metadata.description: How many monitored services exist in the system's inventory

metadata.name: Monitoring locations count
metadata.description: How many monitoring locations are defined

metadata.name: Node count
metadata.description: Number of nodes being monitored

metadata.name: Top-ten sysObjectIDs
metadata.description: Which device types dominate the set of SNMP-enabled nodes

metadata.name: DCB: device count by sysObjectID
metadata.description: Number of nodes with at least one config backed up, broken down by sysObjectID, including nodes that lack a sysObjectID

metadata.name: Notifications globally enabled
metadata.description: Whether notifications are in use on this installation

metadata.name: Current number of open Notifications
metadata.description: Current number of unresolved Notifications in the system

metadata.name: Current on-call role count
metadata.description: Whether, and to what degree, on-call roles are in use at the site

metadata.name: OpenNMS startup time
metadata.description: Duration of most recent app startup, from JVM start to state indicated by "Startup complete" in manager.log, in whole seconds

metadata.name: OS architecture
metadata.description: CPU architecture of the core system

metadata.name: OS name
metadata.description: Operating system in use on the core system

metadata.name: OS version
metadata.description: OS kernel version in use on the core system

metadata.name: Current number of open Outages
metadata.description: Current number of unresolved Outages in the system

metadata.name: Product name
metadata.description: Which core product (Horizon vs. Meridian) is in use

metadata.name: Polls completed
metadata.description: Number of polls completed since the core last started up

metadata.name: Provisiond thread pool sizes, requisition-def counts
metadata.description: Whether Provisiond's thread pools have been tuned; whether and which types of external requisitions are in use.

metadata.name: Current requisition count
metadata.description: Number of requisitions present in the system

metadata.name: Current foreign-source definition count
metadata.description: Degree of detector / policy customization in use from one requisition to the next

metadata.name: RPC strategy
metadata.description: Whether Minions get their polling / collecting instructions via Kafka or ActiveMQ

metadata.name: List of enabled service daemons
metadata.description: Which optional daemon-having features are enabled at the site, and which on-by-default ones have been disabled

metadata.name: Services per interface mode
metadata.description: Arithmetic mode of the number of services per IP interface, calculated both canonically and with zero-service interfaces excluded from consideration. The string key divides the two sets; the lists are empty if no mode exists for its considered population.

metadata.name: Services per interface stats
metadata.description: Statistical breakdown of the distribution of IP services across IP interfaces. For the population of IP interfaces, characterize the number of services per interface as minimum, maximum, arithmetic mean (rounded value), and median (rounded value). Each set is calculated both canonically and with zero-service interfaces excluded from the population; the topmost string key divides the two sets.

metadata.name: Sink strategy
metadata.description: Whether Minions ship traps, syslogs, flows, and streaming telemetry via Kafka or ActiveMQ

metadata.name: Current situation count
metadata.description: Whether ALEC is likely in use and how much work it's doing

metadata.name: Current SNMP interfaces count
metadata.description: How many SNMP interfaces does the system know about across all devices?

metadata.name: SNMP Interfaces per node mode
metadata.description: Arithmetic mode of the number of SNMP interfaces per node, calculated both canonically and with zero-interface nodes excluded from consideration. The string key divides the two sets; the lists are empty if no mode exists for its considered population.

metadata.name: SNMP Interfaces per node stats
metadata.description: Statistical breakdown of the distribution of SNMP interfaces across nodes. For the population of nodes, characterize the number of SNMP interfaces per node as minimum, maximum, arithmetic mean (rounded value), and median (rounded value). Each set is calculated both canonically and with zero-interface nodes excluded from the population; the topmost string key divides the two sets.

metadata.name: SNMP interfaces with flows
metadata.description: Whether flows are being ingested, and a notion of how widely flows are exported to us

metadata.name: System tracking UUID
metadata.description: Acts as a "primary key" for a system's data over time

metadata.name: TSS plugin loaded, if any
metadata.description: In case time-series strategy is TSS, which TSS plugin is registered

metadata.name: Time-series strategy
metadata.description: Whether the site uses RRDTool / JRobin, Newts, or a TSS plugin for time-series persisting

metadata.name: Current user count
metadata.description: Number of login accounts defined locally to the installation; may exclude SSO users

metadata.name: Product version
metadata.description: Which version of the core product in use
